message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it's worth at least $15,000  due to its unique value. However, I'm willing to start the conversation at $13,500. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $13,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay up to $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. While I'm confident this product will bring you significant value, I can meet you halfway. How about $12,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $12,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
